title: Piping Plover
subtitle: Super Power Confidence
description: In this episode of 'Rarefied,' host Meredith Meeker takes listeners on a journey to the beach to learn about the elusive and endangered piping plover. Despite its vulnerability, this small shorebird wins hearts with its charming appearance and behaviors. Meredith is joined by Sydney Shepherd, the coordinator of the Ontario piping plover conservation program with Birds Canada. Sydney shares insights into the dedicated conservation efforts, including banding, monitoring, and habitat protection, that aim to secure the future of this species. They discuss the bird's breeding habits, the threats it faces, and how volunteers and the public can aid in its preservation.
